amendment.description: To permit the offering of consumer-driven health plans under MedicareAdvantage.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1087 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 1087 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Craig. (consideration: CR S8537-8538) To permit the offering of consumer-driven health plans under MedicareAdvantage.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1087 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Craig.
